name: Way to the light
description:
You are a tourist enthusiast who penetrates various dungeons, tunnels and catacombs, exploring all sorts of shelters, abandoned military bases and other underground structures. Diggerism is considered to be a type of industrial tourism. Get into the role of this person.
You are a real digger, having descended down a vertical shaft of a mine, you find yourself in an abandoned tunnel system. Lack of daylight and illumination. It is up to you to find your way out of these tunnels, explore the dungeons, explore the stations and mines. A large location for a quiet walk underground. A first-person game with elements of horror. Explore the dungeon and its rooms, collect batteries for your flashlight. The darkness can conceal various secrets.
